titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Sheet Music Collection, 1823-1956
titlestmt.subtitle: Sheet Music Collection Ms2003-021

publicationstmt.date: Â©2016 By Virginia Tech. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-01-06T12:35-0500

titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2003-021

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The Sheet Music Collection contains various songs (lyrics and music) from about 1823 through the mid-20th century.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Sheet Music Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

altformavail.head: Alternate Form Available
altformavail.p: Images of some sheet music covers are availabe on Virginia Tech's Imagebase.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Sheet Music Collection, Ms2003-021, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Sheet Music Collection consists of multiple accruals of sheet music, largely acquired by Special Collections prior to or during 2003.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Some processing and description of the Sheet Music Collection was completed in 2003. Additional description was completed in 2015.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Sheet Music Collection contains various songs (lyrics and music) from about 1823 through the mid-20th century. Music in the collection is predominantly from American popular culture, but there are also some pieces from Europe, a well as theater souvenir programs and song-books. The folder list below includes a list of song titles and, when known, composers and lyricists, for each box in the collection.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Sheet music in the collection is in the order in which it was received. For the most part, it is organized alphabetically by the composers last name. Songs for which the composer is not known are in the last two boxes (7 and 8).

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Annie M. Hale Sheet Music Collection, 1892-1987, Ms2010-002. Finding aid available online.
Archer Lawrie Sheet Music Collection, 1879-1935, Ms1970-004. Finding aid available online.
